    Snps to Genes

    Snp2Gene.Rd

    Maps SNPs to their nearest genes within TSS windows.

    Snp2Gene(snp, refGene, marg = 10000)

    Arguments

    snp

    (char) PLINK bim file (only CHR, SNP, and BP columns considered).

    refGene

    (char) refseq table with header.

    marg

    (integer) region upstream and downstream(default=0).

    Value

    Note

    updated GenomicRanges to version 1.30.1 on 01/30/2018 Requires ignore.strand=TRUE param to properly run distanceToNearest() given unknown strand assignment for SNP array-based genotyping info

    Examples

    library(scPagwas)
Pagwas<-list()
gwas_data <- bigreadr::fread2(system.file("extdata", "GWAS_summ_example.txt", package = "scPagwas"))
Pagwas <- GWAS_summary_input(
 Pagwas = Pagwas,
 gwas_data = gwas_data,
 maf_filter = 0.1
)
#> Input gwas summary data frame!
#> No "chr" from chrom!, now pasting it!
#> Filtering out SNPs with MAF criterion
Pagwas$snp_gene_df <- Snp2Gene(snp = Pagwas_data$gwas_data,
refGene = block_annotation,
marg = 10000)
#> Error in DataFrame(..., check.names = FALSE): object 'Pagwas_data' not found
